title: AGGN Open LoL Tournament - 16th April

embed.description: Razer Arena makes organizing and competing in your own tournaments easier than ever. Complete with features that allow for easy match creation, automatic reporting of results, scheduled match notifications, fair competitive play. Arena is truly the best way to take your passion for gaming up a notch.

body:
Hey!

AGGN are running our first Open LoL Tournament on Razer Arena. It's a free to enter tournament open to any skill level with some awesome prizes up for grabs!
Every player from the winning team will win A Razer BlackWidow Chroma keyboard, $100 Mwave credits, 1600RP, Triumphant Ryze and a 4-win IP boost!

If you want to enter, you have to make sure you register on both the following locations. Register your team on: https://arena.razerzone.com/tournaments/details/2304/aggn-open-lol-tournament

To be eligible for the Riot prizes, you must also register on: http://events.oce.leagueoflegends.com/events/184632

If you have any questions, post them below! Further details on the tournament can be seen on the Razer Arena event page.

GL HF
